snippet: Clay Buchholz improved to 3-0 on the season with a 0.41 earned run average in Boston’s victory over Tampa Bay.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox beat Tampa Bay Rays, 5-0; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Clay Buchholz improved to 3-0 on the season with a 0.41 earned run average in Boston’s victory over Tampa Bay.

headline.seo: Clay Buchholz Takes No-Hitter to Eighth in Red Sox Victory Over Rays
headline.main: No Hits Until Eighth as Buchholz Stops Rays
headline.print_headline: No Hits Until Eighth As Buchholz Stops Rays
